cu.explanation_en: Setting SCTP_INSTREAMS to -1 (negative value) will cause invalid SCTP configuration error and connection failure.

du.explanation_en: Setting dl_absoluteFrequencyPointA to -1 (negative frequency) will cause invalid downlink frequency configuration error and cell setup failure.
du.explanation_zh: 將 dl_absoluteFrequencyPointA 設定為 -1（負頻率）會導致無效下行鏈路頻率配置錯誤，並造成小區設定失敗。
